verses.verse: "And you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Gog, <S%H1463><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> you, O Gog, <S%H1463><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of Rosh, <S%H7220><s%> Meshech, <S%H4902><s%> and Tubal; <S%H8422><s%>

and I shall turn <S%H7725><s%> you around, <S%H7725><s%> drive <S%H8338><s%> you on, take <S%H5927><s%> you up from the remotest <S%H3411><s%> parts <S%H3411><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> you against <S%H5921><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"And I shall strike <S%H5221><s%> your bow <S%H7198><s%> from your left <S%H8040><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and dash <S%H5307><s%> down <S%H5307><s%> your arrows <S%H2671><s%> from your right <S%H3225><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"You shall fall <S%H5307><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> you and all <S%H3605><s%> your troops, <S%H102><s%> and the peoples <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are with you; I shall give <S%H5414><s%> you as food <S%H402><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> kind <S%H3671><s%> of predatory <S%H5861><s%> bird <S%H6833><s%> and beast <S%H9130><s%> of the field. <S%H7704><s%>
"You will fall <S%H5307><s%> on the open <S%H6440><s%> field; <S%H7704><s%> for it is I who have spoken, <S%H1696><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"And I shall send <S%H7971><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> upon Magog <S%H4031><s%> and those who inhabit <S%H3427><s%> the coastlands <S%H339><s%> in safety; <S%H983><s%> and they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"And My holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> I shall make <S%H3045><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and I shall not let My holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> be profaned <S%H2490><s%> anymore. <S%H5750><s%> And the nations <S%H1471><s%> will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One <S%H6918><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is coming <S%H935><s%> and it shall be done, <S%H1961><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%> "That is the day <S%H3117><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> I have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

"Then those who inhabit <S%H3427><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will go <S%H3318><s%> out, and make <S%H1197><s%> fires <S%H1197><s%> with the weapons <S%H5402><s%> and burn <S%H9610><s%> [them,] both shields <S%H4043><s%> and bucklers, <S%H6793><s%> bows <S%H7198><s%> and arrows, <S%H2671><s%> war <S%H4731><s%> <S%H3027><s%> clubs <S%H4731><s%> and spears <S%H7420><s%> and for seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> they will make <S%H1197><s%> fires <S%H784><s%> of them.

"And they will not take <S%H5375><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> from the field <S%H7704><s%> or gather <S%H2404><s%> firewood <S%H2404><s%> from the forests, <S%H9194><s%> for they will make <S%H1197><s%> fires <S%H784><s%> with the weapons; <S%H5402><s%> and they will take <S%H7997><s%> the spoil <S%H7997><s%> of those who despoiled <S%H7997><s%> them, and seize <S%H962><s%> the plunder <S%H962><s%> of those who plundered <S%H962><s%> them," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"And it will come <S%H1961><s%> about on that day <S%H3117><s%> that I shall give <S%H5414><s%> Gog <S%H1463><s%> a burial <S%H6913><s%> ground <S%H4725><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the valley <S%H1516><s%> of those who pass <S%H5674><s%> by east <S%H6926><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and it will block <S%H2629><s%> off <S%H2629><s%> the passers-by. So they will bury <S%H6912><s%> Gog <S%H1463><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> his multitude, <S%H1995><s%> and they will call <S%H7121><s%> [it] the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hamon-gog.
"For seven <S%H7651><s%> months <S%H2320><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will be burying <S%H6912><s%> them in order <S%H4616><s%> to cleanse <S%H2891><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

"Even all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> will bury <S%H6912><s%> [them;] and it will be to their renown <S%H8034><s%> [on] the day <S%H3117><s%> that I glorify <S%H3513><s%> Myself," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"And they will set <S%H914><s%> apart <S%H914><s%> men <S%H376><s%> who will constantly <S%H8548><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> through the land, <S%H776><s%> burying <S%H6912><s%> those who were passing <S%H5674><s%> through, <S%H5674><s%> even <S%H853><s%> those left <S%H3498><s%> on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the ground, <S%H776><s%> in order to cleanse <S%H2891><s%> it. At the end <S%H7097><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> months <S%H2320><s%> they will make <S%H2713><s%> a search. <S%H2713><s%>

"And as those who pass <S%H5674><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> and anyone sees <S%H7200><s%> a man's bone, <S%H6106><s%> then he will set <S%H1129><s%> up a marker <S%H6725><s%> by it until <S%H5704><s%> the buriers <S%H6912><s%> have buried <S%H6912><s%> it in the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hamon-gog.
"And even <S%H1571><s%> [the] name <S%H8034><s%> of [the] city <S%H5892><s%> will be Hamonah. <S%H1997><s%> So they will cleanse <S%H2891><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>"'

"And as for you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'Speak <S%H559><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> kind <S%H3671><s%> of bird <S%H6833><s%> and to every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%>" Assemble <S%H6908><s%> and come, <S%H935><s%> gather <S%H622><s%> from every <S%H5439><s%> side <S%H5439><s%> to My sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am going to sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> for you, as a great <S%H1419><s%> sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that you may eat <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> blood. <S%H1818><s%>

"You shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of mighty <S%H1368><s%> men, <S%H1368><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> as [though they were] rams, <S%H352><s%> lambs, <S%H3733><s%> goats, <S%H6260><s%> and bulls, <S%H6499><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them fatlings <S%H4806><s%> of Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

"So you will eat <S%H398><s%> fat <S%H2459><s%> until you are glutted, <S%H7654><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> until you are drunk, <S%H7943><s%> from My sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> for you.

"And you will be glutted <S%H7646><s%> at My table <S%H7979><s%> with horses <S%H5483><s%> and charioteers, <S%H7393><s%> with mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"And I shall set <S%H5414><s%> My glory <S%H9202><s%> among the nations; <S%H1471><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> will see <S%H7200><s%> My judgment <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have executed, <S%H6213><s%> and My hand <S%H3027><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have laid <S%H7760><s%> on them.
"And the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> from that day <S%H3117><s%> onward. <S%H1973><s%>

"And the nations <S%H1471><s%> will know <S%H3045><s%> that the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H1540><s%> into exile <S%H1540><s%> for their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> they acted <S%H4603><s%> treacherously <S%H4603><s%> against Me, and I hid <S%H5641><s%> My face <S%H6440><s%> from them; so I gave <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> of them fell <S%H5307><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>
"According to their uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> and according to their transgressions <S%H6588><s%> I dealt <S%H6213><s%> with them, and I hid <S%H5641><s%> My face <S%H6440><s%> from them."' "

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Now <S%H6258><s%> I shall restore <S%H7725><s%> the fortunes <S%H7622><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and have <S%H7355><s%> mercy <S%H7355><s%> on the whole <S%H3605><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and I shall be jealous <S%H7065><s%> for My holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%>

"And they shall forget <S%H5375><s%> their disgrace <S%H3639><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their treachery <S%H4604><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they perpetrated <S%H4603><s%> against Me, when they live <S%H3427><s%> securely <S%H983><s%> on their [own] land <S%H127><s%> with no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> to make <S%H2729><s%> them afraid. <S%H2729><s%>

"When I bring <S%H7725><s%> them back <S%H7725><s%> from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> them from the lands <S%H776><s%> of their enemies, <S%H340><s%> then I shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> through them in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the many <S%H7227><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>

"Then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> because I made them go <S%H1540><s%> into exile <S%H1540><s%> among <S%H413><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and then gathered <S%H3664><s%> them [again] to their own land; <S%H127><s%> and I will leave <S%H3498><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> of them there <S%H8033><s%> any <S%H5750><s%> longer. <S%H5750><s%>

"And I will not hide <S%H5641><s%> My face <S%H6440><s%> from them any <S%H5750><s%> longer, <S%H5750><s%> for I shall have poured <S%H8210><s%> out My Spirit <S%H7307><s%> on the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>
